scenarios.description: Strong contradiction bridge with explicit falsifier should pass novelty gate

idea.thesis: Counterfactual channeling improves anomaly robustness under intervention shift
idea.description: Use a causal intervention channel to separate confounded correlations from mechanism-consistent anomaly signatures.
idea.mechanism: The intervention channel blocks confounded pathways and surfaces stable residual effects.
idea.prediction: If intervention channel is removed, precision@k falls by at least 10%.
idea.falsifier: Ablate intervention channel and compare precision@k under same dataset split.
idea.noveltyAssessment: Bridges conflicting assumptions in prior art.

contradictionMatrix.claimB: Intervention channel causes overfit under shift.

scenarios.description: High overlap and weak falsifier should be blocked and recovered

idea.description: Tune threshold to improve anomaly detection on same dataset.
